code: import React from'react';import'./Ride.css';import Popup from'reactjs-popup';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function RideHistory(){const navigate=useNavigate();const myHistory=[{id:1,pickup:'123 Apple Street',dropoff:'456 Banana Road',vehicle:'car',date:'September 1, 2024 07:14:00'},{id:1,pickup:'456 Banana Road',dropoff:'123 Apple Street',vehicle:'car',date:'September 1, 2024 12:03:00'},{id:1,pickup:'123 Apple Street',dropoff:'1515 George Mason Avenue',vehicle:'truck',date:'September 5, 2024 08:34:00'}];const onCancelClick=()=>{navigate('/home');};const onOKClick=()=>{navigate('/home');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:'mainContainer',children:myHistory.map(e=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:'historyContainer',children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["From: \"",e.pickup,"\" To: \"",e.dropoff,"\" Vehicle: ",e.vehicle," On: ",e.date.toLocaleString('en-US',{day:'2-digit',month:'2-digit',year:'numeric'})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Popup,{trigger:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{children:"Report Issue"}),modal:true,nested:true,className:'modal',children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Thank you, your ride is scheduled."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{for:"message",children:"Please tell us about the issue:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{name:"message",type:"text"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:'submitContainer',children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:onCancelClick,children:"Cancel"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:onOKClick,children:"Submit"})]})]})]});})});}
